string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Ha ha! I'm glad you are here, stalker. Conozco a un hombre que podría usar tu ayuda. Vea si puede ser de ayuda para él.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Recuperar PDA para Barbas
Barbas tiene una PDA escondido que contiene algo de suciedad de Buho.

Bueno, mi amigo, tengo el trato para ti! Ese idiota de Buho cree que puede cerrarme pero sé algo sobre él. Hay una PDA que he escondido que tiene todo lo que necesito para ponerlo en su lugar. Tráemelo, stalker. Haré que valga la pena. ¡Decir ah! ¡Lo tienes!
Buen hombre, stalker! ¡Aquí, tómate una copa!
Búsqueda y rescate de Stalker
Monolito ha capturado a un stalker. Encuéntralo y rescátalo.
Stalker, las perras del Monolito han capturado a uno de tus camaradas. Se dirigieron en esa dirección. Salvarlo! ¡Jaja!
Miren a los dos, es difícil saber quién perdió la pelea, ¡jaja! Ven, ven, bebe!
¡Toma un poco de vodka y no sientas más dolor!
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
If ya ain't bringin' me no dead mutants there ain't nothing we got to talk about. Better keep on walking.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Find %s for Noah's Dog
Noah's mutant pet is hungry for %s. La mascota mutante de Noah está hambrienta de %s. Mejor encontrar alguno pronto antes de encender al viejo fúnebre.
¿Dónde demonios has sido niño? I'm out of dog food! This little bitch is gonna eat me out of house and home. She's a looker though, ain't she? Al igual que su maestro.
Bueno, ¿para qué diablos estás parado allí? ¡Dame un maldito %s para alimentar a mi perro!
About damn time! Here you go, girl. Eat up. She's such a pretty lass. Look how full that coat is... ¿Qué? You still here? Aquí, toma esto si te hace ir.
Exterminate Noah's Mutant Infestation
El viejo fulano Noah está teniendo problemas para mantener el área libre de mutantes. Ayuda al viejo.
You're late! There's mutants everywhere out here! You expect me to keep killing them all? ¡Sal de ahí y deshazte de ellos maldita sea!

You've been gone all day! How the hell long does it take to kill a couple damn mutants? Toma tu maldita paga y lárgate de mi bote. Y acaricia a mi perro cuando salgas, ¿quieres? Ella ama la atención y los dedos stalker.
Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Tengo un cliente para ti. I've marked his location on your map.
Buena suerte.
Trace the Emergency Signal ($freq MHz)
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs, but $item_1 is required to search.
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs.\nHead over $map.
Vector wants you to trace the emergency signal sent by a group of mercs.\nUse the $item_1 and set up the frequency to $freq MHz. Search for a good signal around.
You must retrieve the $item_2 you found and show it to Vector.
Go back to Vector with your findings.

A bit late, but I'm glad you're here. We were finishing our business last time, until I recieved an emergency signal coming from the south. I can't mistake this one, it's coming from the PDA that belongs to one of the men I sent yesterday to our base in the other side of the Zone. Something went wrong, so I need you to trace their signal by using an RF receiver and find what happened. You must bring the PDA too, It contains sensetive information.
So they all dead? What a shame... You brought the PDA back at least. Here's your reward.
Secure the Passage to the Outskirts
Vector wants you to go inside Jupiter Underground, and eliminate the monolith squad hiding in there.

Bad news, and this time it's the fucking monolith. The underground network between Jupiter and Outskirts has been used for while by our squads. That's how we carry operations inside the Outskirts of Pripyat while avoiding contact with the fanatics above. But just when you thought that business is good, the last mercs who went there have been ambushed by a monolith squad out of no where, as if the mutants are not enough already. I need a brave man like you to get rid of them and secure the passage. We can't let them lurk there.
Splendid work! We are back to business. Here, for your trouble.
Clear area of mutants
Mutants are about. Caza hacia abajo y despeja el área.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Escucha, escucha eso? Algunos mutantes aullando. Todavía me da escalofríos después de todo este tiempo. ¿Qué tal si sales y cuidas de ellos? I'll make it worth your while.
Haha! Well done, stalker! Have a drink on Beard!
Find the "%s" Artefact for Beard
Beard wants you to find the "%s" artefact for him.
Me ocupo de artefactos. I usually don't buy them from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Do you want to try to get it for me?
I'm looking for the "%s" artefact. You ever seen one? If you can find it, I'll make sure you're well paid.
Good hunting, stalker! Have a drink on the house!
My Brother's Keeper
Kill the Military Stalker

There's a guy; used to be a regular stalker just like anyone else on this ship. One day, some Military officers came and offered him a commission. The next thing we knew, he's found murdering his former brothers in cold blood! We cannot stand for that! Find this traitor and avenge the men he shot in the back.
Ah, you killed him? Help yourself to a drink. I'm sure we could all do with one...
Eliminate Target
Encuentre y elimine el objetivo y luego regrese a Sultan para el pago.

Hay muchas personas en la Zona que me han frotado de la manera equivocada o me han mostrado falta de respeto. Algunos de estos pinchazos me deben dinero o jodieron algún trato. Estas personas no son más que ratas que necesitan ser eliminadas. Si está listo para la tarea, le daré su información para que pueda rastrearlos a través del GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Encuentra %s
%s are required by Cardan to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
Not only do I need some more booze, but I could really use a good set of tools, stalker. If you're interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas básicas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Genial, stalker. You brought exactly what I've asked. Gracias.
Encuentra %s
%s are required by Cardan to install advanced equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

I could really use more tools and vodka... but the vodka is easy to find. Lo que necesito de ti es más herramientas; mejores herramientas. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Siéntase libre de pasar en cualquier momento para tomar una copa o si necesita que eche un vistazo a su equipo.
Encuentra %s
%s are required by Cardan to install expert equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

I could really use more tools and vodka... but the vodka is easy to find. Lo que necesito de ti es más herramientas; mejores herramientas. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Debe contener lo que necesito. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Siéntase libre de pasar en cualquier momento para tomar una copa o si necesita que eche un vistazo a su equipo.
Benefactor: get in the teleporter anomaly on the hill
Benefactor: clear out the mutant lair
Benefactor: tell Noah about the successful mission
Snorks have been threatening Noah for a while. He wants me to clear out a lair at the southern plateau.
Benefactor: help Noah get a new rifle
Benefactor: bring Noah an Armsel Protecta
Noah wants my help getting an Armsel Protecta so that he can rest easy at night.
Consigue %s
A mercenary has asked me to collect %s.
You feel like arranging a real safari? You will hunt people and bring their patches. We will be raising the standards of the faction.
You feel like arranging a real safari? Bring me %s and I'll pay you well. We will be raising the standards of the faction.
That's what I'm talking about! Here's your money.
Encuentra %s
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.

Listen, what kind of mercenaries are we without well-maintained and custom equipment? You know, we used to have tools for anything, but some fuck stole them from the substation workshop. So, I need tools, and not shitty ones either. Can you find us some?

Listen, what kind of mercenaries are we without well-maintained and custom equipment? You know, we used to have tools for anything, but some fuck stole them from the substation workshop. So, I need tools, and not shitty ones either. Can you find us some?
Damn, you deserve a discount. Gracias.
Encuentra %s
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.
Having reliable weapons is nice, but so far we're without any sufficient upgrades. Will you find me an even better set of tools?
Having reliable weapons is nice, but so far we're without any sufficient upgrades. Will you find me an even better set of tools?
Gracias. Let's see how much I can help you and the others out with this!
Encuentra %s
A mercenary technician has asked me to bring him %s.
Listen - let's finish our job, shall we? I need calibration tools to make sure that no scumbag escapes us.
Listen - let's finish our job, shall we? I need calibration tools to make sure that no scumbag escapes us.
Oh, fuck... You are the hero of every technician! Well done indeed... I'll be doubling your discount.
Encuentra %s
%s is required by Axel to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
¡Gran trabajo! Eres mío a lo grande.
